steps.label: First Note
steps.desc: Welcome! To encode a single note, you'll need a node element and the three attributes pname (name of the pitch), oct (octave) and dur (duration). So try to enter the following encoding: <note pname="c" oct="4" dur="4"/>.

xpaths.hint: You need a @pname attribute, with a value of c.
You need an @oct attribute, with a value of 4.
You need a @dur attribute, with a value of 4.

steps.desc: Congratulations, you've just encoded your first note in MEI. To continue, write a half note G4 in fifth octave (pitch name g with a duration of 2 in octave 5).

xpaths.hint: You need a @pname attribute, with a value of g.
You need an @oct attribute, with a value of 5.
You need a @dur attribute, with a value of 2.
